description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully.
expected_result: Homepage should load completely with all elements visible, including the 'FIND CLOTHES THAT MATCHES YOUR STYLE' banner, brand logos, and product previews.

description: Verify that the 'Shop Now' button on the homepage navigates to the correct page.
expected_result: Should navigate to the main shopping/category page.

description: Verify that the newsletter subscription form works as expected.
steps: Enter a valid email address in the 'Enter your email address' field.
expected_result: A success message should appear, confirming the subscription. Alternatively, the email field could be cleared, indicating successful submission.

description: Verify that the category page loads successfully.
steps: Navigate to a category page URL (e.g., 'Casual').
expected_result: Category page should load with all products visible, filters available, and sorting options functional.

description: Verify that the filters on the category page work correctly.
steps: Navigate to a category page URL.
Select a filter (e.g., price range, color, size).
expected_result: The product list should update to display only the products that match the selected filter criteria.

description: Verify that the sorting options on the category page work correctly.
steps: Navigate to a category page URL.
Select a sorting option (e.g., 'Sort by: Most Popular').
expected_result: The product list should be reordered according to the selected sorting criteria.

description: Verify that the product detail page loads successfully.
steps: Navigate to a product detail page URL.
expected_result: Product detail page should load completely with product images, description, price, size and color options, 'Add to Cart' button, and customer reviews visible.

test_name: Product Detail Page Add to Cart Test
description: Verify that the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page functions correctly.
steps: Navigate to a product detail page URL.
Select a size and color (if applicable).
expected_result: A success message should appear, confirming that the item has been added to the cart. The cart icon could also update to reflect the added item.

description: Verify that the cart page loads successfully.
steps: Navigate to the cart page URL.
expected_result: Cart page should load with all added items displayed, along with their details (name, price, quantity), order summary (subtotal, discounts, delivery fee, total), and 'Go to Checkout' button.

description: Verify that the 'Go to Checkout' button on the cart page navigates to the checkout page.
steps: Navigate to the cart page URL (ensure there are items in the cart).
expected_result: Should navigate to the checkout page.
